query: Is there a JAX in the next month?
actual_response:

There is no upcoming JAX event as of 2025-11-10. The latest JAX-related events available in the documents include the W-JAX 2025 held in early November 2025 and the JAX London 2025 in October 2025. The next scheduled JAX event after these is the JAX 2026 in Mainz, planned for May 2026 [1.]  [2.].

The W-JAX 2025 took place from November 4th, 2025, with sessions including the opening keynote by Sebastian Meyen [1.].
JAX London 2025 was held in October 2025, featuring a rich program and community activities [3.]  [4.].
The next JAX event after these is the JAX 2026 in Mainz, scheduled for May 4th, 2026, with an opening keynote by Sebastian Meyen [2.].

Thus, no JAX event is scheduled within the next month from November 10, 2025.
In conclusion, while JAX events are regularly held and well-attended, the next one after early November 2025 is planned for May 2026, so there is no JAX event in the upcoming month [2.].
